channel.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OjLPlj9.png[/img][/center]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Mk6ztiB.png[/img] [size=14pt][i]Journey to the world of [b]Avarrocka[/b]! Avarrocka is a 317 RSPS that is packed with high quality content. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE encounters that helps foster our player-driven economy. Avarrocka can simply be defined as 'unique'. For example we have a guild system that is truly meaningful and rewarding. The concept surrounding Avarrocka is one of a kind and the design (down to the smallest details) is incredible.[/i][/size]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/G0dG1EG.png[/img] [size=14pt][i]At Avarrocka we strive to deliver uniquely distinct & diverse content. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with unique content of the highest quality. Our outstanding staff team will quickly amend any issue you may have on your adventures.[/i][/size]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/d0FB2AT.png[/img] [size=14pt][i]We are consistently adding improvements to Avarrocka, so that it can be the best and most modified, yet stable server in existence. We're also much more inclusive than your average online destination. Avarrocka is for gamers of every breed; new members are the fiber that binds our community, so we welcome them warmly! Our focus is around our members, and the staff team works tirelessly to ensure that everyone enjoys their experience.[/i][/size]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rc13CWn.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cikKTaw.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ggR6pXm.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mdVHxR0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NAWNszQ.gif[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/esO5LqD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JNuvjaf.gif[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d3ydIMW.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wcPTIuk.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5Rt66yc.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WEQ99Rx.png[/img]
[hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mW6jUfW.png[/img]
[hr]
[table] [tr][td][img]http://i.imgur.com/EapoaR5.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/ekjXGqX.png[/img][/td] [td][b]Location:[/b] You can access the altar at the center of Varrock near the fountain.
[b]Skill:[/b] This is a very basic and simple skill but yet effective. You can pickup bones from monsters all around the world. With those bones, you can decide to just bury them or use them with the 'bones on altar' method which would give you extra experience. The altar also gives you the choice to fill prayer points, change spell-book or change prayers.[/td][/tr] [/table]
[hr]
[right][table][tr] [td][b]Location:[/b] You can access the altar at the center of Varrock near the fountain.
[b]Skill:[/b] This is a very basic and simple skill but yet effective. You can pickup bones from monsters all around the world. With those bones, you can decide to just bury them or use them with the 'bones on altar' method which would give you extra experience. The altar also gives you the choice to fill prayer points, change spell-book or change prayers.[/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJQTpA0.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/zaVYOX0.png[/img][/td][/tr] [/table][/right]
[hr]
[table] [tr][td][img]http://i.imgur.com/Rheogz0.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/saQlcBV.png[/img][/td] [td][b]Location:[/b] Bear Guild entrance (North-East from the center of Varrock(Manhole)).
[b]Skill:[/b] There is no wilderness courses, barbarian outpost courses nor gnome courses. They are now defined as Bear's training camp ground. From centuries, Bear guild has been performing exceptional agility skills due to their camp grounds. Bears Guild is the only one to process those camp grounds. There are three camp grounds.[/td][/tr] [/table]
[hr]
[right][table][tr] [td][b]Location:[/b] Apothecary's shop is the perfect place where to start practicing herblore.
[b]Skill:[/b] By killing monsters around Avarrocka, you can pickup several herbs. By cleaning them, you'll be ready to start making your potion. Every other item can be found in the herblore shop by talking to the apothecary. Combining all those items would make you a perfect potion that you could use to promote your skills.[/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/z8d2VcB.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/6N6a4Ww.png[/img][/td][/tr] [/table][/right]
[hr]
[table] [tr][td][img]http://i.imgur.com/iMIpTyQ.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/HuLgOO3.png[/img][/td] [td][b]Location:[/b] There is no specific location as you can find different NPC's to pickpocket them.
[b]Skill:[/b] You can start off by pickpocketing few 'mans' around Varrock. When you get to level 27, you can move on to the seed stall which can be found at the location shown above. This way, you would have your supplies to begin farming![/td][/tr] [/table]
[hr]
[right][table][tr] [td][b]Location:[/b] You can start crafting by accessing the shop located west at the king's palace.
[b]Skill:[/b] You may cut gems, create precious rings to complete tasks and tane some hides for your range armour.[/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/qhcvVBF.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/szZAwyI.png[/img][/td][/tr] [/table][/right]
[hr]
[table] [tr][td][img]http://i.imgur.com/4YKqZDF.png[/img][/td] [td][img]http://i.imgur.com/jWxtqhJ.png[/img][/td] [td][b]Location:[/b] There is no specific location. You can get the knife in the general store.
[b]Skill:[/b] With the woodcutting skill, you get various logs with which you can make arrows, bolts or even bows. It's a common easy skill. You simply click the knife and after on your log to start cutting your log.[/td][/tr] [/table]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HbSyWC5.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Areas:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [list] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/WlUtLjM.png[/img] [i]Bear's Guild Area.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/ino78iQ.png[/img] [i]Owl's Guild Area.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Pg6dJFU.png[/img][i] Lion's Guild Area.[/i][/li] [/list] [/spoiler]
[size=14pt][b]Activities:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [list] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Quiuvmd.png[/img] [i]Royal Varrock Guards.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/BCKiFvM.png[/img] [i]Training Portal.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/l6tyx9l.png[/img] [i]Minigame Portal.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/2gPOlDU.png[/img] [i]Bears's Guild Entrance.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/b24T6Ek.png[/img] [i]Owl's Guild Entrance.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/H4Cazak.png[/img] [i]Lion's Guild Entrance.[/i][/li] [/list] [/spoiler]
[size=14pt][b]Facilities:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [list] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/GdzmfSL.png[/img] [i]Altar.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Hx5G8FK.png[/img] [i]Anvil.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/l64hu4v.png[/img] [i]Apothecary.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/YWLj72U.png[/img] [i]Cooking range.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/zWAEAUt.png[/img] [i]Furnace.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Iqz8y3Q.png[/img] [i]Mining site.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/muv0lsC.png[/img] [i]Rare trees.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/vDUgNjg.png[/img] [i]Runecrafting altar.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/zcXc0FY.png[/img] [i]Water source.[/i][/li] [/list] [/spoiler]
[size=14pt][b]Shops/Goods:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [list][li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yy5DLV6.png[/img] [i]Bank.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q8rnpOh.png[/img] [i]General store.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/atH2gXS.png[/img] [i]Clothes shop.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/dhVabDt.png[/img] [i]Armour shop.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/Y41d0WI.png[/img] [i]Magic shop.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/AgYyRQW.png[/img] [i]Weaponry shop.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/f0JSf3o.png[/img] [i]Archery shop.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/FNRUBgP.png[/img] [i]Bar/pub.[/i][/li] [li][img]http://i.imgur.com/4gwiXko.png[/img] [i]Gambler/Shop manager.[/i][/li] [/list] [/spoiler]
[hr]
[SPOILER=IV Progress]

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:135, topic:541099”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=659968.msg4454982#msg4454982 date=1414170505]
I figured out the issue and got my motivation back! Development back up. Planning to host this before february 2015 for sure. Like it or hate it.
[/quote]told you nothing is impossible <3[/quote]
Yep

[quote=“naseem142, post:134, topic:541099”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=659968.msg4454982#msg4454982 date=1414170505]
I figured out the issue and got my motivation back! Development back up. Planning to host this before february 2015 for sure. Like it or hate it.
[/quote]

yay!

Glad your back, and Good luck with everything else![/quote]
Thanks.

[hr]

Figured out the jaggrab protocol with newer data. I was trying this for a long time as we have a huge cache of 145mb. It works with all indices(including textures). I’ll be adding ondemand sprites too.

Read full topic

Artem and others through skype have told me before that it is still being worked on.[/quote]

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Usually when someone asks something about how developmental progress is going, and they reply saying that they’ve lost their motivation - it’s easy to assume it’s no longer being developed.

With that being said, this project was dead long before it started.

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:123, topic:541099”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=659968.msg4453465#msg4453465 date=1413168920]
The factor that the project no matter how slow in development that they haven’t given up yet means a lot. Especially considering I could never keep a development for that long.
[/quote]

Lol how do you know it’s still in development he said he stopped developing because he lost motivation after a bug he faced.[/quote]

He did not say he stopped. He just said… [quote=“artem543, post:118, topic:541099”]Lost motivation due to a bug we faced.[/quote]

Him saying, “Lost motivation”, does not necessarily mean he stopped it just means that he doesn’t work on it as much as he used to.

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:114, topic:541099”][7:37:44 PM] Artem Batutin: would you mind to explain what core essentials I’m changing?

I mean this shouldn’t be necessary in order to execute a script for some action

@Override public void execute() { ScriptManager.callFunc("processRuneCrafing", player, data); stop(); }

Rather it should just… work, write the plugin and be done, no core editing or additions, this will take some more core code and implementation but in order to have a very flexible and organized plugins it is necessary[/quote]

I don’t totally understand what you’re trying to explain. Is it the fact that I have a task that directly directs to the script which is bad?

You do have the call functions sometimes. Per instance the packets, I call functions such as “itemOnItem_#” “ItemOnObject_#” and “npcClick_#”

otherwise i’m using tasks because I don’t see an alternative way to handle the scripts as actions. Python syntax is different and I can’t seem to use something like this in my scripts:

				TaskQueue.queue(new ForceMovementTask(player, new Location(l.getX() - 2, l.getY()), ControllerManager.DEFAULT_CONTROLLER) {
					@Override
					public void onDestination() {
						if(player.getInventory().hasItemId(6)) {
							player.getInventory().remove(6);
							player.getAttributes().set("dwarfmulticannon", new Cannon(player, l.getX(), l.getY(), l.getZ()));
						}
					}
				});

[hr]

Fire pit! a new way to train firemaking.

So there is a fire pit near the king’s palace. Players can put logs to the fire pit to receive a small amount of fire making experience. You need 100 logs to fire up the pit. The one to put the last log to fire up the pit will receive a good amount of fire making experience and can get a chance to receive items such as fire gloves. The logs slowly burn out. You can add more or leave the fire die.

Before ( less than 100 logs ) - After (fire burns)

Read full topic
item.source: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[7:37:44 PM] Artem Batutin: would you mind to explain what core essentials I’m changing?

I mean this shouldn’t be necessary in order to execute a script for some action

@Override public void execute() { ScriptManager.callFunc("processRuneCrafing", player, data); stop(); }

Rather it should just… work, write the plugin and be done, no core editing or additions, this will take some more core code and implementation but in order to have a very flexible and organized plugins it is necessary

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Veni, Vidi, Vici - Enjoyable game-play!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Pretty sure hardcoding the function defeats the purpose of a script/plugin, you shouldn’t need modify any core essentials in order for a plugin to work

The benefits i currently see in my python scripting system:

[ul][li]Reload scripts after the runtime has been started(no need to restart the server)[/li]
[li]More organized in terms of big content such as: npc clicks, object clicks and such.[/li][/ul]

Please tell me how could I improve.
